com.Cardinal.PMC.Forums

Class Thread

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Cardinal.PMC.Forums.Thread

  • public class Thread
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to represent a forums thread.
    Author:
    Cardinal System

    • Constructor Detail

      • Thread

        public Thread(java.lang.String url,
              Category category,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String content,
              User author,
              java.lang.Object[] details,
              int ID,
              java.util.List<Reply> replies)
        Constructs a new Thread object.
        Parameters:
        url - the thread URL.
        category - the thread category.
        title - the thread title.
        content - the thread content.
        author - the thread author.
        details - the thread details in this order:
        [emeralds, views, timestamp]
        ID - the thread ID.
        replies - the thread replies.

      • Thread

        public Thread(java.lang.String url,
              java.lang.String title,
              User author,
              Category category)
        Constructs an unloaded thread object.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL of this thread.
        title - the title of this thread.
        author - the thread author.
        category - the thread category.

      • getReplyByID

        public Reply getReplyByID(int ID)
        Gets the reply with the given ID.
        Parameters:
        ID - the reply ID.
        Returns:
        The reply. Null if this thread is not loaded or does not contain a reply with the given ID.
